comments: It's a good bingo game with a good amount of variety. Love the fact that you can play in different rooms and get bonuses with the puzzles! I was wondering if buying the elite pack is a one time purchase or a monthly fee. Couldn't find the answer anywhere. One tip to make it even better would be to make the tickets a little easier to get. Otherwise would give 5 stars!

My only issue with this game is that u almost have to end up purchasing tix to continue to play. The further u move on in the game, the more tix each card costs & ur only given a certain amount thru a daily reward. App should provide ways to earn more tix, either thru a daily spin or higher rewards. *(since app developer replied to this review, I changed my review to 4 stars)

The game itself is very fun.  However, if you run out of tickets, it is way too difficult to earn more.  Apparently, they made it easier to earn tickets but after playing many other games, the update isn't enough.  To continue playing, you must buy tickets.  I may have to delete the game which is a shame because it really is a fun game.    3/18/18... They tell you to play lower cost games to get more rewards but it doesn't.  It just takes you a bit longer to go through your tickets but you don't win anything.  Time to delete.  Graphics were great and games were fun but without tickets you can't play.

Really liked this game. Now i cant play it because its near impossible to get more tickets. I cant complete daily tasks as I have no tickets and ive got to wait ages to get daily tickets. Even then there gone within 5-10minutes and cant get no more until following day. Games dont pay out enough either when you win

It's been nice...I'm happy to share: they heard us. We can earn power now, the games are fun, excellent pace. Thank you "Dataverse", I appreciate your changes üíØ ‚ò†‚ò†‚ò†‚ò†‚ò† UPDATE: n again 1/11. again: I ventured and came back. I can buy credit in January. Cuz we HAVE to have boosts to play long. Here I go !Update. I like a lot. Spent 20 but you simply can't spend enough.  must buy boosts too. Boosts get stuck

I really like this Bingo  game.  A few upgrades and it will  be better than all the other Bingo games.  I love the amount of tickets it gives you to play.  I love the extra stuff you can earn and not have to pay for.  A couple of things that would  make this game better would be all 4 cards on one screen in tablet mode, the power ups being applied automatically  and being able to daub that last number that's  called cause usually that's the one needed for Bingo.  Otherwise its great.  I hope  you find this useful.  I understand  if you can't  fix all three of these but the first 2 are more important  than the last and i understand  there can only be a certain amount of bingos i guess.  Thank you.  Real close to being a 5 but those 3 issues really hold me back as I'm  sure it does others as well.

comments: This is a great game. It's fun, addictive, and a great time killer. The only problem I see is that I created an account on the game thinking it would save. WRONG! I had to do a factory reset on my phone and now I have to start over. I was so far with some really good cards, but alas I know more about the game now, so maybe I'll get there quicker this time.

Don't bother downloading this game.  The customer service in this game is terrible.  I submitted a ticket because several combinations i researched in game disappeared.  I got a response that the game would fix itself and my ticket was being closed.  The problem didn't fix itself and i can't remember every combo lost. I submitted another ticket and I'm waiting for a response but after how my first ticket was handled I'm not confident they'll fix it. I've only been playing a few days but if the game is this buggy already then i don't recommend downloading it.

It's actually surprisingly fun. The card mechanics are simple to grasp but with a enough depth to keep you trying new decks and combos. I chuckled a few times at some of the dialouge between the characters. 10/10 would recommend

The game is addictive, but in short it's a gamble for cards. The prices are a lot for what you are getting. Lots of repetitive challenges. Unfortunately the quest for cards is really a quest for your wallet. I played since 9/16 and decided to walk away. Unfortunately you get to a point where the only way to move up is to spend, spend, spend. The gambling pulls for cards on real money game currency got old.

The main problem with the game in my opinion is being able to attack your opponent while they have other cards in play. Perhaps if you could choose to block rather than be forced to take it the game would be a bit better aa youd have to manage your resources a bit better rather than beat hard until its over. Aside from that it is a very fun game to play

Waste of money. No matter what you spend you never get decent cards. They stack the odds so no matter how you buy cards you'll always get ripped off. Mom's box is supposedly random yet I've bought hundreds of boxes I've never got anything worth a damn. I've played over a year and wasted a hundred bucks on this game w no reward. I strongly recommend you don't spend a dollar on this game. It won't help. The game will still screw you. Money will not help on this game.

comments: This game is very hanging my mobile another games are good  speed but this game is  no speed  improve this game

Dear team, It's really a awesome game ever. I'm playing it since 2 years. Very addictive. But i request you to all, when we start a TEAM RACE many players join clans for playing team race n take efforts in team race for getting better reward but many of them team leaders kick players just before ending the team race n players won't receieve any reward for it. It was happened with me 2 times. So please do any update for those players who take much efforts in team war and then also they get nothing. Thanks

This game used to be 5 star. They've changed it where all team events are gem sucks. You have no chance of winning without using a considerable amount of gems. They've taken away most in game free ways to get gems, and to buy them is not worth it, they're very over priced. It's not a team event, it's a paid for event. If they change it and make it more fair for everyone I'll make a new rating.

It's a nice game with so many awesome monsters. I like it and it's my favourite game in this category. My suggestion is that if you can include an option to cancel ongoing breeding by giving gold or gems or without anything, it would have been better. The game has events that comes very frequently, it helps so much in getting new monsters and or progressing in the game.

The game is awesome! The game play, the monsters, and also the actual fighting and graphics. This is one of my most rated games and my most played; I couldn't go a day without it. It's competition is so good online with people and in dungeons and the map, also team wars are fun with your friends. Get this game you'll never regret it.

DO NOT PAY FOR ANYTHING IN THIS GAME. Recently my account was reset due to the game posting the wrong price of gems. I have lost everything even the things I paid full price for. I have been robbed of gems, cells, gold, food and my time. If you do play the game, don't spend actual money because they can take it all away. BE CAREFUL
description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates! Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!If you‚Äôre all about multiplayer games, you‚Äôll love Team Wars, where you‚Äôll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop. Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start building, collecting and battling today! Monster Legends is a beast of an action game! MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURESBREED & COLLECT ‚Äì UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week! - Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!- Set your monster teams strategically, combining  the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates!

Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!

Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!

If you’re all about multiplayer games, you’ll love Team Wars, where you’ll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop.

Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start building, collecting and battling today! Monster Legends is a beast of an action game!

MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURES

BREED & COLLECT – UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT
- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week!
- Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!

BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS
- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!
- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.
- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.

STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME
- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.
- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!
- Set your monster teams strategically, combining the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together
- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!
- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. The higher you are at the end of the season, the better your rewards!
- Fight in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader!
- The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.
- Team Wars are the ultimate Multiplayer Games: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!
- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.

BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!
- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!
- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!

Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? Find out with Monster Legends, the action RPG that will put you in charge of a monster empire!

Download today and start training your monsters!

Check Monster Legends out on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegends
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Monster_Legends
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/MonsterLegendsGame

Other great titles by Social Point: Dragon City, World Chef and Dragon Land. Check them out!

Monster Legends is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

If you love your monsters, make them smile. Drop us a nice review here!

comments: I love playing this game. It is now my favorite phone game of all times. I have seen other reviews about waiting for energy takes too long. It does take a long time but to me that is part of it. It makes you slow down and enjoy simple fun. Too be honest all of us need to slow down and enjoy life around us. I play it on my breaks at work. The way you play this game allows for  short or long periods of play . Also it's quite fun seeing the little guy demolish tiles. It truly is an awesome game. I have recommended it to family and friends.

I deleted all of my games except for Diggy's Adventure. This is my favorite game. I am going to play this game until me and Diggy win, and then I'm going to play it again from scratch. Google should make a whole lot of games like this. They are way better than match 3 puzzle games. I love cats I wish they could make a kitty's Adventures game like Diggy's Adventure.

I've played this game for almost 2 years and have not once had a problem and have spent a lot of money. For some reason it's now crashing every few mins. I don't lose progress or anything but it's getting frustrating to have to keep restarting. I've even updated the app on my Android. Please help? It's my favorite app and I just want to dig!

I really like this game but... It has been glitching A LOT for me lately. While I am playing it will freeze my phone. If I walk away for just a few seconds it freezes. My favorite glitch is after I watch a video for energy and before I use it the game kicks me out. Upon my return the energy is gone and I can't get energy for 2 more hours. üòê

Very addictive game but you spend more time waiting for energy than playing. When you have unavoidable tiles of over 400 points it doesn't take long to lose all your stored energy. I thought games were for playing, not waiting around. It's play for 5 minutes wait for an hour. It's a shame because some of the puzzles are quite good.

I love this game. It's super addicting and best paft..you don't HAVE to spend money on diamonds or add ons to actually play. I really get bored of games when all they want is more of your hard earned money. So keep up the great work.
description: Search for hidden treasures, solve puzzles, fulfil godly quests and reveal the greatest mysteries of the past in Diggy‚Äôs Adventure. Diggy's Adventure Features:- #1 Rated Adventure Game- 1000+ Riddles & Puzzles to solve- 500+ Labyrinths to escape from- 100+ Funny characters to interact with- 5 Mythological locations with loads of forgotten treasures- Regular weekly updates full of fun events- 18 languages to play in- Dedicated team working tirelessly to tease your brain and challenge your skillsJoin the family of Diggy, Professor, Linda and Rusty on their journey to explore the world full of ancient civilizations and mysteries.No secret may remain hidden!Diggy's Adventure is a perfect game for all types of players. Get ready for a greatly written story full of plot twists while progressing through thousands of brain-teasers and beautiful locations as Egypt, Scandinavia, China or Atlantis. Enjoy the creative side of the game - craft items and match various ingredients to help you digging, build your camp or decorate it. Developing your camp is vital since each maze and riddle require energy to get through the blocks and advance into the other location or mine.Solve riddles & puzzles to gain rewardsGain rewards and experience points to improve rate of energy regeneration or maximum energy capacity by digging through the mines and fulfilling in-game quests assigned by Gods and other characters. Each special event brings you a big content update as well as a lot of tiny improvements to make the game even more challenging and entertaining.Note: A network connection is required to playNote: Diggy's Adventure is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money.Do you have any suggestions or problems? We would love to hear from you!Contact us at support@pixelfederation.com!
descriptionHTML:
Search for hidden treasures, solve puzzles, fulfil godly quests and reveal the greatest mysteries of the past in Diggy’s Adventure.

Diggy's Adventure Features:
- #1 Rated Adventure Game
- 1000+ Riddles & Puzzles to solve
- 500+ Labyrinths to escape from
- 100+ Funny characters to interact with
- 5 Mythological locations with loads of forgotten treasures
- Regular weekly updates full of fun events
- 18 languages to play in
- Dedicated team working tirelessly to tease your brain and challenge your skills

Join the family of Diggy, Professor, Linda and Rusty on their journey to explore the world full of ancient civilizations and mysteries.

No secret may remain hidden!
Diggy's Adventure is a perfect game for all types of players. Get ready for a greatly written story full of plot twists while progressing through thousands of brain-teasers and beautiful locations as Egypt, Scandinavia, China or Atlantis.

Enjoy the creative side of the game - craft items and match various ingredients to help you digging, build your camp or decorate it. Developing your camp is vital since each maze and riddle require energy to get through the blocks and advance into the other location or mine.

Solve riddles & puzzles to gain rewards
Gain rewards and experience points to improve rate of energy regeneration or maximum energy capacity by digging through the mines and fulfilling in-game quests assigned by Gods and other characters. Each special event brings you a big content update as well as a lot of tiny improvements to make the game even more challenging and entertaining.

Note: A network connection is required to play
Note: Diggy's Adventure is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money.

Do you have any suggestions or problems? We would love to hear from you!
Contact us at support@pixelfederation.com!
developerAddress: Einsteinova 19, 851 01 Bratislava, Slovakia
recentChanges: What's new in this version?:
- We fixed some bugs
summary: Explore world's biggest mysteries in our addictive puzzle solving game!
title: Diggy's Adventure

comments: App is addicting! Fun to play! Levels get difficult  as you get higher. They should offer special coin purchase of 12,000 coins for $1. Since they take 500 every time to add 5 more moves! Would keep people playing more and they would have more purchases! That's how I'd rack in the bucks if it were my app!

2ND UPDATE: 3/21/18- Thank you for adding new bathrooms and bathroom rugs! Thank you also for giving new, unique furniture on 5th or 7th consecutive days. Great job, and ty for  listening to players and making more  levels and changes and continued updating!  UPDATE: 2/2018 Please make more optional designs to find at neighbors' homes. I've been searching, and I can't find any more. Especially for the bathroom, and for the garden/flowers. That is one of the best features of the game. ty!         Thank you for the new update and new expansion!  Cant wait to achieve the new rooms. Best game!  Much better than "Scapes" Games. I like the way you can travel to neighbors to get new interior design fashions! A new idea that is brilliant. I am spoiled now! LoL Thank you and please keep up the hard work!

Good game. Fun so far. I enjoy renovating the first room and the master bedroom.  So far I have only one complaint. Why can't I get the master bedroom? While I'm all for being generous, generosity has its limits and it is MY house. It might seem small to some but it does irritate me as I do love the story as one of the best bits. I'm not the only one who doesn't like her just claiming for herself. It comes across as rather arrogant and presumptuous of her. An idea might be to give me the master bedroom and then give her another where you can design it more to her tastes as a decorator.  Apart from that story issue just keep on going.

Getting a little frustrated with this. I play on both my phone and tablet. When I try to play on my phone it asks me to update to synchronize my progress yet there are no updates available.  I have switched off and on and even uninstalled and reinstalled.  Very annoying that I cannot now play on my phone.  Just reinstalled this and it is working great now. Thank you for sorting. 5 stars all round.

I am obsessed with this game! Love that you can easily make friends with other real players and use their furniture! Mixed levels of difficulty which means you never get stuck on a board for an annoying amount of time. Only thing is that when choosing your furniture, you have to click the picture a bunch of times before it let's you preview it.

I like this game but it's frustrating how it's hard to get stars and then they want you to waste them on things like giving the cat a bath... I want to decorate the house not do all the silly side things.

descriptionHTML:
Decorate your mansion with a match-3 makeover puzzle game! Design new home decor & furniture by matching candy, power-up with levels and renovate your entire house, including your kitchen & garden. Download Matchington Mansion for match 3 makeover madness!

Match candy and play Matchington Mansion, an adventure filled fun game! Hone your interior design skills while protecting your house from a mischievous cousin, unlock new rooms, renovate your kitchen or garden and discover secrets hidden among the furniture – all with a cast of quirky characters in tow. You can even spy on the neighbors and check out their room design choices. Are you ready to navigate this challenging match-3 home decor puzzle game?

Room Design & Match 3 Makeover Madness: Top 5 Reasons to Download:
Match & swap candy in a fun game to innovatively decorate your mansion!
Secrets, rewards and an intriguing narrative – piece together all the hidden objects & learn new secrets
In-game characters to meet and interact with – follow their interesting stories while you play
Play levels with tons of room design options & thousands of DIY Decorations – unlock hidden areas for rewards
Power-up combos, incredible boosters and tons of levels in a fun game of matching!

Decorate your mansion, power-up and deck out your kitchen & garden in style. Unlock hidden areas for rewards, makeover each room with new furniture and interesting home decor. Puzzle out Matchington Mansion adventure stories with innovative matching gameplay, aided by your friend Tiffany, quirky characters and a house cat or pet dog along for the ride!

Play Matchington Mansion for FREE, with optional in-game items for purchase. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Download our match-3 adventure puzzle game – the MM team sincerely hopes that you like it! We are working very hard on perfecting it, so if you run into any issues while playing or you have any suggestions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at mm@firecraftstudios.com.

More ways to learn about Matchington Mansion:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/matchingtonmansion/

title: Matchington Mansion: Match-3 Home Decor Adventure

comments: üòé I mean Formula and the new super car are beautiful and cool but practically they don't pay off on rash tracks because of their ground clearance, that needs to be rectified otherwise both of them are showpieces in the garage. And the snowmobile is useless anyhow.

What have you done?!! This was a great game with a few annoying adverts, now it's just one long advert interspersed with occasional races. I have no real issue with adverts but when they stick on the screen and hide the X until way after the timer ends that's just offensive. And seriously - ¬£8.99 PER MONTH to clear ads? (Yes I know you get extras) - come on that's taking the ****

Really fun casual game. Adverts are present but not too intrusive. Allowed to watch adverts in exchange for upgrades or items.   My only criticism is that it takes a while to get used to the different menu items as there's no instructions and the "see as far as you can go" sections are really expensive to unlock.

I've been crazy about this game, but the new update is terrible because of the crashes and bugs. In the middle of race my touch screen doesn't work, the pedals either. Please, for god sake,fix this annoying problem, i can't play any more.thanks a bunch

Fix the damn gas pedal. The reason why I lose half my races cause the gas pedal just magical doesn't want to read my finger but the brake sure does work just fine. Keep shoving ads down my throat and it'll be all 1 star.

Money greedy game. You will end up watching ads every minute. You will be forced to watch half a minute irrelevent ads every minute. It's like these guys built the best game to annoy people with ads. Good luck. Played several levels just to get annoyed and uninstall.

comments: BEWARE!  They will take the system down and give you when it will be back up.  Only problem is they bring it up before the advertised time.  Meaning you are left vulnerable.  They do not follow their own rules.  They do not compensate players for their mistakes.  They let Chinese player buy packs cheaper and use at accounts.  If you are a Westerner do not play or pay on this game.  Their customer service sucks.  They actually try to get you to feel sorry for them.  Its amazing.  They will only steal from you.

This is definitely a pay to win game.  And I agree with previous reviews saying it favors Chinese players.  The developers claim it's not, but if it wasn't true, then why are 99% of the servers dominated by Chinese players?  Plus the Chinese to English translations are terrible.  You will barely understands what they're saying.
The game could use more tool tips and information to properly explain all of the content. If I hadn't played a similar style game before this would be difficult to understand for a beginner.

The graphics are great and the game play is interesting but it's very independent to new players; from other players as well as the system itself. Like things that have been improved on in this genre of game in other apps are still frustrating here. Oh well, what can I expect from a freemium game? Overall it's enjoyable but I have to take it in doses; basically until I get frustrated by the gameplay or other players. All in all, there are worse was to spend your time.

Great game. Gold prize is high but there is a weekly pack that is fair prize. Ive played the game for over a year now and the devs are good when it comes to improvemennts to the game. I am still waiting on a visual change to the ark home screen and a beter view on the map screen.   All in All i love this game.

I love this game. Can you bring more ppl in ...is same like so little ppl in the server... Also please reduce the price for item that using gold or can you speed up the gathering time for resources... So we can have more fun
description: - Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!I built, I sailed, I conquered!Join the battle NOW!With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.Mighty Space Arks- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.Ultimate Galactic Military Power- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.MMO Strategic Gameplay- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. descriptionHTML:
- Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!
- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!

I built, I sailed, I conquered!
Join the battle NOW!

With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.

Mighty Space Arks
- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.
- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.
- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.

Ultimate Galactic Military Power
- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.
- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.
- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.

MMO Strategic Gameplay
- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.
- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.
- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. Use diplomacy to establish the order of your world.
- Trade your equipment and resources with other players and become a space merchant.

descriptionHTML:
Tiered of far too same games, stories and experiences? Looking for something thrilling and unique? You’ve found it!

Welcome to The Island – place where there’s no time to be bored. Where two lost kids urgently need your help to survive. Where numerous hidden treasures are waiting for you to hunt for them. Where ancient Archipelagos pop up from nowhere to be explored. Where hundreds of quests, missions and puzzles makes you feel challenged every day. You’ll dig it.

But remember! – The Island has The Secret.

Island Experiment features:

♥ Help two lost kids survive on The Island
♥ Turn an abandoned beach into a flourishing farm
♥ Grow food, craft equipment, build a seaside city
♥ Explore the Island and its Heartland
♥ Hunt for hidden treasures
♥ Travel to ancient Archipelagos
♥ Reveal a mystery of a Pyramid
♥ Complete thrilling quests & challenging missions
♥ Gain unique rewards
♥ Collect lovable local pets
♥ Play with your friends and make new ones
And… have fun!

The game is free to play and addictive. Be careful!

Graphics are good an Gun play is pretty fair. When battling the game goes on runs where I get matched against teams whos members are way stronger then my team an I. Then it goes back to fair match making.   3 Month UPDATE: The game has turned into a money grab. You have no chance to compete against players that drop a bunch of money an have 4 an 5 star guns. Amazing game, however there is one small problem, but not enough for me to not give it 5 stars. Recently when I've been watching an ad to double the reward at the end of the battle, the video has played until the end and it says the reward has been doubled, but I only receive the regular reward? It has happened 15-20 times and it's getting slightly annoying, as I'm about 4000 gunbucks short of what I should be now. Anyways, thanks for making such an awesome free game with little to no adverts!  UPDATE: video watching for additional rewards does not work with anything. No extra crates or supplies

One of the best fps I've played. Graphics is cartoonish but fun, Remedy is underpowered in the sense that it doesn't generate a decent HP on each hit. On lower levels, it's decent but on higher levels against Porcupine, Ranger, Thunder it doesn't stand a chance that could be balanced out by either increasing the rate of fire or increased health generation on each hit , Lifestealer is pretty darn awesome but could do better with a bit smaller crosshair and little bit more accuracy

Initially the game seems super addictive but once you hit level 16 it gets ridiculous. You have players who have spent money on guns and you're practically no match. Also the teaming of players should be balanced out. Another thing is even if you win a match you win around 30 trophies, if you lose there's a loss of 60 and if by chance you're internet is bad and you automatically get kicked out and cannot reenter you lose a 100 .Eventually you get sick and tired of all this and the game gets boring.
description: ‚úî ‚ÄúA brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10‚Äù ‚Äî PocketGamer‚úî ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.‚Äù ‚Äî Android and Me‚úî ‚ÄúGuns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before ‚Äì it‚Äôs a legitimately great shooter on mobile.‚Äù ‚Äî Droid Gamers‚úî ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.‚Äù ‚Äî AndroidCommunity‚úî ‚ÄúGuns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.‚Äù ‚Äî 148Apps‚Ä¢ Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!‚Ä¢ Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!‚Ä¢ Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.‚Ä¢ Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! ‚Ä¢ Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!‚Ä¢ Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain‚Äôt no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won‚Äôt fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It‚Äôs so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!

Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/
developerAddress: Antakalnio st. 17, LT-10312, Vilnius, Lithuania
recentChanges: Try the new 60-120 FPS high-end gaming experience and our full-fledged eSports Spectator mode!
HIGH-END GRAPHICS
- Frame Rate settings ‚Äî enjoy the smoothest gameplay ever at 60 FPS on most devices and 120 FPS on Razer Phone
SPECTATOR GALORE
- New Spectator mode ‚Äî use 3rd person and top-down cameras to freely switch between players during matches
- Restrict Spectating in Private Matches to prevent stream sniping
- AR Spectator for Android is finally here!
BALANCE UPDATE
- Rebalanced 6 guns
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!
title: Guns of Boom - Online Shooter

comments: Love it. Been playing for over a year. You can earn gems slowly to get premium characters or spend money to get them. However you do not need premium characters to play the game. I think people forget that your "FREE" games have to make money some how to pay developers, animators, IT support and more. Either they have dozens of ads everyday (DK has a few but not dozens) or premium paid content.

Most addictive game! Playing it since it 1st started. Love the new mystery event it's so adorable except your missing one vital character!!  I think there's a couple points to improve on... the send home button in the characters actions list I think should be up the top and smaller instead of scrolling down for it cos I use it often. 2nd all of the sounds in my game are very poor, it's nearly always silent and music is always late. Haven't heard the high 5 sound in ages üòî please fix the sound!

The game is fun and all, but do you think you guys could get this game optimized for the Lenovo tablets? I had to get a new tablet since previous one broke. Now the game keeps closing out on me when I'm trying to do something. Think you guys can fix this somehow?  I'd appreciate it if you do. Thanks in advance.

This game has given me nothing but problems. Every update has to have a glitch. First there was a problem when ever I tried to open a chest. Then an update came and After that update now the consetion stands close out the game anytime I want to view. Now with winnie the poo update the whole dam game is slow. Seriously thinking of quiting. It doesn't matter every update has a glitch. Can't u guys fix it? Or is just me?

This is a fun game. Graphics are so very Disney.  I have a question.. WHAT is the reason for the guests to have a character over their head? That is quite distracting..especially when I don't know what their purpose is.  Also..I wish their leveling up and their quests weren't so long..I only get to play about 5 minutes. But I do love the game

This game is amazing! I love it so much! It just reminds me of my childhood, and of all of the TV shows I used to watch. I have only 1 problem with this game, it does not count time when you go out of the game or close your phone. It might just be me, but if it wasn't for the bad saving, I would have given this game 5 stars, since it deserves it, or even more.

descriptionHTML:
Join over 50 million players who are reliving the magic of Disney! Embrace your inner child and create the Disney Park of YOUR dreams!

CREATE YOUR DREAM PARK:
► Decorate the Park your way!
► Build 100+ Disney Park attractions like Space Mountain, Haunted Mansion, and “it’s a small world”!
► Features attractions from Disneyland Park, Disney California Adventure, Walt Disney World, Tokyo Disneyland and Disneyland Paris!
► Celebrate with iconic parade floats and fireworks!

COLLECT BELOVED DISNEY CHARACTERS:
► 150+ characters from Beauty and the Beast to The Lion King, Toy Story, Frozen and more!
► Share special moments with Mickey Mouse, Rapunzel, Buzz Lightyear, Tinker Bell and others!
► Characters from over 90 years of Disney magic!
► Adventure through over 1,000 whimsical character quests!

BATTLE DISNEY VILLAINS:
► Save your Park from menacing Disney Villains!
► Break Maleficent’s evil curse!
► Battle against Gaston, Scar, Mother Gothel and more!

FREQUENT SPECIAL EVENTS:
► New characters, attractions and other content added regularly!
► Monthly and weekly special events with limited-time rewards!

PLAY ANYWHERE, ANYTIME:
► With offline mode, you can take your Park with you on the go!
► Connect with Facebook to get the latest news, tips and tricks!

Come and join us in the most magical free game on mobile! It’s your world for the making!

Perfect to play for fans of Disney, Disneyland, theme park games, Pixar movie games, fun games, tycoon games, free family games, and park builder games.

_____________________________________________
You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN.
In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never.
Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.
This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.
Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet.

Find out more about the game on the official site -- http://www.disney-magic-kingdoms.com/
_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central

comments: Nice game but the random number generator is non existent. Hold three numbers and roll again, even with free or earned additional rolls, are ALWAYS the same number that was there! This would fail state regulations on gambling games. Fun but a sucker game for rolling anything that counts as statistically random

This is fun, IF you can figure it out. I like playing yahtzee but this is complicated. Every time I get extra dice, the ???? spends them or takes them away from me so I don't get to spend them the way I want to. That sucks.

Love the game! But recently did an update for the app now my game glitches out. Takes forever to roll the dice. Only updated the app cuz it said they fixed bugs & made faster well it did the opposite for my app.

Showdown is a joke!  100% guarantee opponent will get a double Yahtzee every single game.  Their average score is 320+ when a normal person scores 250-275.  Impossible enough to score a Yahtzee yourself but double is almost unheard of.

Playing verse your friends is fun but Playing against the computer is not fun but a complete waste of time. Only way to Win is to Extra rolls with the Dice you have to buy. If you don't plan on losing 2/3 of the time.
The game was awesome until the ads started to pop up every 5 seconds, and the game progressively got slower and slower. Now it's just ads upon ads and lag. Game got ruined quick.

descriptionHTML:
Roll dice & play New YAHTZEE® With Buddies! It’s a fun board game classic with a reinvented look. Play dice with friends in this new multiplayer dice game.

Challenge friends to play this family game for hours of endless fun! Yahtzee, the #1 dice game, is reimagined in the brand New YAHTZEE® With Buddies! Puzzle game fan? Then you’ll love this new multiplayer dice game! Don’t have a clue what YAHTZEE® is? Download now and you’ll soon find out!

Yatzee, yahsee, yatze, yatzy, or whatever words you choose, there’s only one Yahtzee! Give it a roll and find out why millions have played this classic family game for over 50 years!

Classic & Fun Board Game on the Go
Play the #1 dice game officially licensed by Hasbro at home or on the go.
Social game meets dice challenge: Roll dice against other players in epic gameplay.
Play dice with friends: You can even chat while you play! Now that’s a social game!

New Multiplayer Dice Game
Multiplayer challenges with Facebook friends AND current Dice with Buddies™ opponents.
Fun, even better game & epic gameplay – you’ll be rolling in no time!
Puzzle games your thing? Then you’ll love this fun board game!

Play Dice with Friends - Roll for Bonus Rolls
Win Bonus Rolls, Custom Dice, prizes and rewards! Defeat new Dice Masters daily to score.
Roll dice in epic battles that put you head to head against skilled Dice Masters!
Multiplayer matchup winners crowned in fun battles – prove you’re the best dice roller among all your friends!

Social Game: New YAHTZEE® With Buddies
Play dice and test your game skills. No need to puzzle over the rules, you’ll be playing in no time!
Bonus Rolls, Custom Dice and amazing prizes are yours to score. Roll dice with flair!
Personalize your Yahtzee experience by winning Custom Dice and vanity frames!

Whether you’re a wiz at words or a strategy enthusiast, there’s just no escaping the fun you’ll have playing New YAHTZEE® With Buddies! Want us to clue you in on why it’s so great? It’s just SO addictive!

Download New YAHTZEE® With Buddies and experience the world’s best family game and fun board game classic come to life! You’ll be lost for words!

Play this multiplayer game with friends, challenge daily Dice Masters or Dice with Buddies™ players to keep the action rolling! Experience thrilling gameplay and hours of addictive fun!

The clue is in the name: yatzy, yahtzee, yatzee, or yachty, there’s only one authentic Yahtzee!

Pick up your shaker, roll dice and prepare to shout “YAHTZEE”!

The HASBRO GAMING and YAHTZEE names and logos are trademarks of Hasbro.
© 2018 Hasbro, Pawtucket, RI 02861-1059 USA. All Rights Reserved. TM & ® denote U.S. Trademarks.

comments: Do not spend any money on this game. This used to be one of the best slot games until the developers got greedy. Payouts are small and events are nearly impossible. They try to make it all sound good but it's not. They also changed the customer service on here where it's hard to get anyone. You cannot message them on Facebook if you have a problem and if you say anything negative about the game you will be blocked. Hope this review saves some of you some time so you can find a better game!

What the hell kind of question is that?  "Is it beautiful".... meaning the game! HOW NOT PERTAINING TO ANY GAMES!  Anyway,  this game is hands down the best Slot game EVER!  Have played slots in and out of casino's for over 20 years and this is the one to play! A huge variety of Casino games,  easy to maneuver and a lot of really nice people.

I used to love this game but something they did changed it. Winning is nearly impossible even if you are a paying customer. I know it is a game of luck but when you purchase 85 silver tickets you should be able to complete puzzles when you only need 1 piece for each of them. Make winning a little easier and people will be happy to spend money.  I think the game is broken. I was just playing in a room on Billionaire with a person who was playing on Huge Casino. I know it's the same developer but I don't think that is supposed to happen. I know the person was playing Huge Casino because it was my husband playing it. May want to look into it.

Customer relations are horrible even non existent. If you spend money you will lose far more than you win, in their eyes you will spend even more. If you send a message they will hide behind a canned "industry standard" response. This is not a free standing casino there are no freebies and you can't collect any winnings. Yet they have their games dialed in so you lose in hopes you will spend money. Horrible company.

I just started this account in hopes of recovering my lost one. If it goes smoothly, I am happy with the app to date. The slots don't pay as much as they used to, a little tite , otherwise a fun app. The events they choose for you to play, daily, do steal a lot of chips. If u want to remain in a successful club, you must do them, is the main downfall. I would recommend it to my friends.

This is an interesting game. After I played it for awhile it became very boring. Haven't gotten a big or any good win for the past 70 million. I guess if you buy chips you might win more often. It doesn't give you all the bonuses, and it takes gifts and doesn't give them to the gamers you gave it to. So all in all it's just okay. I've never been able to get anywhere with their support team as they added to my reply. I'd give it a one star but if you buy chips it might be better.

comments: Here I am like many others, unable to get into my game after update. Was level 53, recently earned the Chinese dog and had lots of upgrades to my farm. I would have been excited about the upcoming birthday event if I could access my game. Fix soon or I will delete this and all other zynga games I funnel my hard working money into

Great game, love achieving all the quests, also love the show animals, I wish I could do more than one with a partner though. I wish that during an update that it wouldn't stop the game for the players, showing grassy area with no coins or keys and level 1, so I could continue to play. But I know I just have to leave it for a while and wait till the update is finished, which is hard because it is so addictive. Some people need to remember though that this is a free game.

Liked this game until now. I recieved some keys from the game. I used them then they said they had had some technical difficulties and some players should not have received them then promptly took my remaining keys off me!  This was they're mistake not mine. I find this churlish and ridiculous. It's put me right off the game!

Since Jan this game has gone to hell in a hand basket. Every update I have to fight to get stuff back they y'all took from my game. This game use to be fun, now I don't care if I play it or not. Y'all only care a out the people who spend money on your game, not the loyal ones that's been playing since it went mobile. I'm very disappointed!!

I just started playing this game and was really liking it. In one day I made it to level 15 and had made a purchase using real money. The app froze and I tried everything is fix it but it erased my whole farm and made me start over. I am soooooo mad!!!! And I'm mad I spent money and lost everything. Really not impressed at all

When I first got it it worked fine. (Yesterday). Now every time I get on it'll load but will freeze and not let me do ANYTHING AT ALL. I've tried everything from closing the app to restarting my phone. Please fix it because I really like the game.

descriptionHTML:
**App Store Best of 2014**
Escape to the world of farming, friends and fun! Go on farm adventures to collect rare goods and craft new recipes. Raise animals and grow your farm with friends. Join a farm Co-Op to trade and share or play on your own in Anonymous Mode. You can play FarmVille anytime, anywhere… even when not connected to the internet. Best of all, the world’s most popular farming game is free to play!
** ”FarmVille is back and this time, it’s portable!” – TIME **
** “”Officially not just for Facebook anymore”” – Los Angeles Times **
** “” They may have built the best FarmVille game of the series”” – Kotaku **
- CRAFT a variety of baked gourmet goods like classic country apple pies
- HARVEST farm fresh crops of your favorite fruits and vegetables
- CUSTOMIZE your own farm for charming country living
- COLLECT hidden and rare items as you discover a new coastal farm
- NURTURE and raise a wide variety of adorable animals like your very own farm dog
- EXPLORE a new FarmVille story filled with special farm adventures
- BUILD a lush family farm by the coast so all your friends can visit
- FISH with your fellow farmers and sell your catch at Pike’s Landing
- GARDEN by the beautiful blue ocean as you decorate your farm with flowers and fresh produce
- TRADE and chat with friends or play anonymously with people from all over the world
- ESCAPE to the coast then connect to your Facebook farm to send free water
- EARN daily rewards with the Mystery Chest and take a spin at the Prize Wheel”
Additional information:
• The game is free to play; however, in-app purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $199.99 USD.
• Use of this application is governed by Zynga’s Terms of Service, found at www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service.
• For information about how Zynga uses personal data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.

comments: It is impossible to win the short events for Europeans that need their sleep! The events start around midnight and there is no way you can make up the lost time when starting in the morning without spending a lot of hash or real money on the 1 day events
For some strange reason, since the update my game will not get past the load screen, 89% to be exact.  Be great if you can fix this. S8+

The last event - to win sewer rat Trevor - was truly lame. ESG's greed is astounding and turns a good game into a grind. And despite many pleas, they still won't let you restart the game. Let us turn the extra cards into liquor, then we'll have a chance for a great game.
businesses quickly pay worse, liquor from trunks are small amounts, cards are always hard to find, events are a waste of time. there's nothing good about this game, it's a rabid cash grab.

It's awesome... I like the graphics....and some of the dialogue. Great to pass time..... I'm just getting tired if going to jail....then have to start over....when I could have money when I get out.....so I won't have to depend on a job when I get out.... I can live off my money ...but then continue having my money work for me

descriptionHTML:
Now featuring live events each weekend!

Based on the hit comedy TV show, Trailer Park Boys: Greasy Money is an idle game where you manage businesses in the Sunnyvale trailer park.

Upgrade businesses, get customers and make greasy money! Collect cards, liquors, hash and cash to complete challenges. Complete challenges and bust open trunks. Enter boss fights, get thrown in jail each season and restart your park stronger than before!

NEW! FACEBOOK FRIENDS - Keep your friends close but get your enemies toaster!
NEVER ENDING FUN - New seasons are always being added!
ALL NEW LIVE EVENTS - Join time-limited events to double the fun.
MAKE GREASY MONEY - Manage Sunnyvale's businesses; from a gas station to a casino.
IDLE FUN - Too lazy to work? We get it. Hire workers to automate!
CHARACTER CARDS - Unlock and collect character cards to increase profits.
DECENT! - Follow along with the story through comedic cutscenes.
BOSS FIGHTS! - Tap fast to battle through boss fights.
JAIL IS AWESOME - After each season, you get arrested!

Join the Trailer Park Boys' Bubbles, Ricky and Julian on an adventure to run Sunnyvale. Let’s Go Boys!

It’s not rocket appliances. Download this app game on your brain phone. Smokes, let's go!

---------------

Follow @TPBGame on Twitter and Instagram, like us on Facebook and use #TPBGame in your posts!

descriptionHTML:
Join your Facebook friends & millions of other pirates from the 7 seas in the best pirates game: PIRATE KINGS! Build your land and make it the paradise island that a pirate of your quality deserves!

Millions of pirates & islanders play Pirate Kings every day – Spin away!

Sail to adventure!
Ship away to fun pirate adventures! Play multiplayer games at Pirate Kings and prove you are a true freebooter. Shoot cannonballs to attack rival pirate islands, protect yourself from other pirates’ strikes and mine gold in this pirates adventure game.

Spin the wheel & win prize
There is only one thing a pirate loves more than the islands and seas: gold! Spin the pirates wheel and win free coins - a true pirate can never have enough cash! Even more, if you are truly lucky, shoot cannonballs and attack other pirates’ islands and loot their forbidden treasures and cash. Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum!

Build & grow your islands
Once you’ve gathered enough cash and own a proper island, enjoy the building game experience in this pirate adventure or explore additional islands! Build castles, put up a statue, decorate, and grow your ship as you play this multiplayer game with friends or random people! Pirate, your island is not a game, it is your paradise, let it grow!

Join your mateys!
Your Facebook friends are waiting online to match your pirates’ battle skills – come on board and join your fellow islanders! Spin the wheel and play a game with your Facebook friends or random players around the world, loot their treasure, attack and steal their gold or defend your treasure from their attacks. Pirates love to be competitive!

Additional Mighty Features:
★ Battle your friends – shoot cannonballs and attack, loot and steal gold, defend your island!
★ Spin the daily bonus every day & get FREE BONUS COINS
★ Revenge - Attack other pirates who have looted your precious treasure
★ Play with friends!
★ Use your gold to level up and build dozens of new islands

Become the Pirate King now! It's free-to-play, but you can purchase additional in-game items with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
Any suggestions or new ideas? Experiencing any problems? We love our players! You can reach our support from inside the game!
Pirate, your islands and friends await!

Become a Facebook fan: http://bit.ly/Facebook_PK
Follow us on Instagram: http://bit.ly/PKInsta

comments: Awesome game with a cool soundtrack, the gameplay itself isn't too challenging and has room for strategy. The only downside as far as I can tell is the terrible multiplayer system which doesn't even work most of the time. But overall this game is a great time waster and very enjoyable.

Good graphics. Good units. Awesome skills. Nice drawings. All in all, this is a really good game üòÅüëçüëåBut I have a problem. It keeps stopping everytime I open it. And I've also been addicted to this game for more than a month now üòÑ

It's been a year since I've last played this, still fun. I've been playing this from day to night as far as I could remember. Hopefully, the bugs where the downloading restarts are solved. Nice Gameply as ever, getting hooked to this once again.

This game is fun and addictive. I like that you don't have to work very hard to get decent leveled characters, and having everyone be overpowered makes the game fun. My only problem is how multiplayer is a little wonky sometimes, mainly when the app suddenly freezes during a battle.

Feels satisfying and stress-free , cute characters too. I just have one problem, when it gives me a notifications of free polygons or similar to that, I go check but I don't get anything. There appears nothing in my giftbox.

Great graphics and music and very f2p friendly for a gachapon game. Lots of banners with guaranteed top tier units so if you follow the Discord or Reddit community's advice on when to pull, you can make the free gems go a long way. The more characters you have, the more quests you can do to get more characters, so it may seem slow in the beginning but eventually your character collection will snowball until you have more waifus than you know what to do with!

descriptionHTML:
Play the smash hit that’s been downloaded over 8 million times!
Fun and intuitive! Multiplayer or Solo, an addicting Puzzle RPG with a twist.

THE ULTIMATE MATCH ‘N SMASH GAME
Simply tap the screen to instantly connect and smash panel pieces. Connect up to six pieces for a devastating Crash Panel. Smash enough pieces to unleash a Fever Attack. That’s Crash Fever!

JOIN THE MULTIPLAYER PARTY!
Play solo or join the party with worldwide co-op multiplayer action. Go on quests as a team. Work together, strategize and attack! Exchange IDs with friends, and share characters with other players. Social features help you feel a part of the active Crash Fever community.

EXHILARATING CHALLENGES. THE FUN DOESN’T STOP!
A simple twist on match-style gameplay cascading with fun. Take on regular quests, or try your hand at a variety of challenges. With Crash Fever you can always find new challenges, limited event quests, fun daily quests and more each week.

A PUZZLE GAME WITH CHARACTER
Collect, enhance, and awaken legions of units, build your own party and embark on fantastic quests in an anime-inspired virtual world. Then discover the mysteries of the Hatcher, filled with powerful Ultra Rare units and more.

FEATURES
• Simple one-tap controls let you quickly link pieces together or unleash a barrage of bombs.
• Regular quests, limited event quests plus much more each week.
• Solo or Co-op multiplayer action with up to four players. Work together, strategize and attack!
• A fun-loving community of players! Join and invite friends or a meet new ones on quests.
• Collect, enhance and awaken your characters to build the ultimate party.
• Build teams with Demon, Samurai, Dragon, Mech, Fantasy tribe units and more.
• Complete Weekly and Special Missions for exciting bonuses.
• Unleash panel-shattering chain reactions, over-the-top animations, and frantic Fever Mode!
• Addictive puzzle and role-playing fun. Match ‘em and smash ‘em!

NOTE: Crash Fever is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. A stable network connection is required to play.

Follow Us
Like the official Crash Fever Facebook page to keep up with the latest news.
https://www.facebook.com/CrashFeverEN/

comments: A well made app that's immersive, addictive, and the essence of the Kingdom Hearts franchise. The app is mission based and has a complex but easy to use medal system with rock-paper-scissors type of combat. You can join/make a party, or go solo. Money isn't an issue so long as you pace yourself. It gets better the more you play. There are optional event quests and a story, but don't fret if you can't get the app or just starting out; it's slow going. 735 quests.

Liking the cute art style but my god does this game take forever to download even with a low resolution. Has taken me two attempts and I'm doubtful that it's related to my broadband speed and connection (not sure if it's to do with my phone? But again, doubtful.) Would be great if this could be fixed somehow.

I freaking love this game! However I have a small complaint that is probably fixable. I was wondering for my lg g6 if you could expand the borders so the screen would fit. And if the screen is not able to get any bigger, I'm hoping you people can at least put a cool border around it instead of leaving it as a black bar. I know you people can make cool borders. Thanks for your attention!

Hey guys, huge fan of the kingdom hearts series and also the game in general. Though one thing I wish you could add is the option to link your data to your Google Play account as well as Facebook. Not a lot of us use Facebook so I wish there was more options to get your data back if you ever deleted the app. Otherwise, good game!

I love this game.  Strategy, adventure, and story (once you get far enough) are all great!  Although it is a little pay to win, and they keep coming out with new medals (attacks) that are infinitely better than your current ones.  This can get discurraging, because your hard work doesn't really mean much in the long run.    I played for 6 month when a friend got a single medal that made him more powerful than me on his 1st week playing.

[Edit: THANK YOU SO MUCH! I love that you all added a lower quality version this way I can play this game.] I like it and all, but when that very large download starts after the tutorial, it stops at 4/6 and restarts, even though my phone has enough room for it, I think. Please fix this, I really want to play it!

After several attempts if at all the server menu loads, the game kicks me out when I try to login my account. I tried repairing the game many times, reinstalled it too many times, but the same problem persists. Hope your team will look into the matter soon. Thank you!

Game always updates especially on patches .. Spent more time on fixing the game to make it work than playing it. And ..l.. for your latest update. Btw. My phone is s8+. And got decent internet connection.

comments: I would give a full 5 stars on everything because I love this game! But I just got a new phone and the account was linked to my Google account and I can't access my character, whom of which, I spent a bit of real money on to make VIP 4. I emailed support and they told me what server my character should be on and she's still not there! It keeps prompting me to make a new character.

So the game glitched out and I lost graphics, no effects when using skills and what not. Other people in game said they had the same problem and said to fix it, you needed to uninstall it and redownload. Which I did. But now my characters are gone and I have to start off fresh. I've spent money in the game on  building up two characters. And I'm pissed now that it appears its money totally wasted. I feel that this is basically stealing!!

My skills didn't come out when I use it.. It didn't show effects when I click on it.. It still deal damage to the monsters though.. So I uninstall and reinstall it back..  however  the loading progress keep restarting.. I had to again..reinstall the game several times! And it still didn't let me complete the download.. It keeps restarting and resetting to 0%

Since updated my graphics have changed. I don't see special effects and  the cloud tasks when I try do them I can't see the flowers and my character glitches threw the floor. And I also lost a my character after logging out and back in again

This is the first game I ever played that u can have a wedding without paying using real money. I guess its a good thing. But else, why u have to take so much time for maintaince.... And it will be the best game I've ever play if u can add more outfit and character...
Was having good time. Went to log in today and said client error after small update. Now I've lost 3 level 40's and won't restore with my Facebook i used my account for...

descriptionHTML:
Daybreak Legends: Origin is a 3D MMORPG developed by a next-gen engine, it will grant you with great fluent combat and exquisite 3D graphics.

The game brings you seamless combat with thrilling blows and various combos! Various things keep you occupied in this game, such as various raids and duels, ranked matches, guild wars, warpet battles and dragon airfight.

●BACKGROUND●
The evil dragon comes, bringing disaster and war to the world. Only the legendary artifact can destroy the evil forces and retrieve light. In order to find the artifact and eliminate the evil, brave adventurers have embarked on a journey into the unknown.

●FEATURES●
- This MMORPG brings you Skywing System, Aerial Battles;
- You can fly freely in a stunning 720 degree panoramic view only in Daybreak Legends: Origin;
- Aerial Battles System takes your battle to the air, ground combat skills and effects will all be mapped to the aerial battles.

◆VISUAL FEAST●
- Stunning 3D graphics and combat effects
- 720 degree panoramic view
- Exquisite character art and design

◆DIVERSE GAMEPLAY●
- As a MMO ARPG, Daybreak Legends: Origin provides intense Real-time PVP&GVG battles
- Summon powerful warpets to battle epic bosses
- Start a romantic relationship and have fun with your friends based on the unique Marriage and social System.

◆PROGRESSION & CUSTOMIZATION●
- This MMORPG provides 4 classes – Puppeteer, Mage, Bounty Hunter and Warrior; and 243 skill combinations
- Customize your character with hundreds of Items, Equipment & Fashion System
- Pets & Mounts System improves your combat power

comments: Love this game. My only issue is with an update a few days ago that gives the background animation. I  have visual issues and the movement is making this game less enjoyable for me. One of the reasons that I  love word games is because the screen is without animation. It would be great if this was an option that could be turned off in settings.

So good I've finished it! Great game for stimulating the mind. Waiting for new levels but at least I can still do the daily puzzle. Only downside is that some of the words are extremely obsure but the dictionary should help with those. Please hurry and add new levels.... I'm addicted!

Challenging, fun and interactive! Great app for those who likes brain and vocabulary challenges :D Down side is that after the update, the butterflies run out in daily challenge even before i finish the puzzle so I always end up with 2 stars... please fix this bug or error...

Very good but log in or if u change phone u loose ur game & start again! üòÇ very frustrating when so far in lol! Also why is lea not a word i thought it was a meadow in the english dictionary? Am i wrong?

Where did the free hints in exchange for ads go?  They had recently moved to their own button, found by hitting "Shop" then X-ing out.  Today, they are completely gone.  I'm going to stop playing this game without them.  It's no fun to get stuck.

Ok. This is my THIRD review of this game and I'm getting a little upset. You put the clues back. Thank you very much for listening to us all. Now I have a new issue with the way you have changed this game. Before People Fun came along, when we put a word into the puzzle, sometimes we would see things like, "Excellent!" Or, "Spectacular!" pop out at us. I noticed this morning that you've taken away that feature. Why? This game was absolutely perfect when you came along. Why are you changing it? Who are you, that you would take a perfect game and then take away the best features? Those words popping out made the game more fun, and they encouraged us to keep going, and yeah, I don't mind saying it. They made us feel good about ourselves. It was a pat on the back. Who gets many of those these days? And you took that away from us. Now this game is dry and boring. Please put the pats on the back, back. Thank you.
