descriptionHTML:
Build a global military empire and destroy your enemies in Modern War by GREE!

World Domination is now within your grasp! Join a faction and join the fight in Modern War, the popular combat game where you face off against enemies for control of country after country, until you rule ‘em all.

Taking over the world isn’t for the weak. Build strength in numbers by teaming up with other players and pooling rewards from individual missions. Then, declare war against rival factions during monthly three-day World Domination events for the chance to put your name on the map—literally. Because in Modern War, it’s not enough to want power, you have to take it.

Features:
• Free-to-play MMORPG military combat game
• Form a faction with friends and other players
• Fight in monthly LIVE World Domination events
• Attack rivals for control of countries and territories
• Run a command center and build fortifications
• Get elected as a faction “Defense Leader”
• See your winning faction’s name on a world map

Visit our Forums: funzio.com/forum
Follow us on Twitter: @ModernWar
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/GREEModernWar
Watch us on YouTube: youtube.com/GREEgames

NOTES:
• This is an ONLINE ONLY game. You must be connected to the Internet to play.
• Modern War - World Domination is suitable for fans of strategy, rpg and mmo games.

comments: Got the game loged into Fb i have so missed this game only issue i have it uses a lot of memory. Good thing i have games that dont have progress so i update this grate game love the new trains.

Came back after a long break. I'm enjoying the updates and improvements I'm seeing. The frequency of updates keeps it interesting and there's always something to work towards. They don't make it impossible to score big ticket items like most games just have to strategize correctly and out in time and just about everything is within reach

Game keeps crashing ,having to re stall the game after every update due to bugs in the system. Very disappointed since I got over charge when buying gems on black Friday, no good hurting loyal high level players by over charging them. Would not recommend game to anyone. And when you do asked a question the customer support team threat you with  no support when you keep asking question over issues or when the update coming. I have found they hate when high level player answer back . I would not recommend game to new players.

March 2018 and it still crashes. Server errors with made up numbers and a broken promise that it will not happen again! Since the last update it's becoming impossible to edit the trains without frequent crashes! Also a different error message number every time! I have progressed very well In the game so far but all the fun is being sucked out by the need to constantly restart the game!

This game was great until the last update. That update has ruined the performance of the game. the graphics geet been improved, but the performance has degraded... please release a new version with better performance, or I will uninstall it... 1 week left

Definitely not a fan of the latest update. Graphics have become very choppy in an attempt to be "sleek".  Trains take twice as long to reach the station now.  Game crashes a lot more often.  I hope the developers fix these issues soon....or this may be the very update that finally gets me to quit.

And also, pls add some advance tactics like 'Tiki-taka', 'gegenpress', 'false nine', etc just like what you guys did in PC/PS PES 2018

I want to make comments what happened with my team if i compared with other team: 1. The passing is worst, my opponent is batter then mind 2. My players seem not to jump to challenge the opponent if the ball on the air 3. The development of the players are taking time..until 30 of age they only reach 90..its to late
Are you kidding? I am so mad right now because the apps crash in the middle of the third round of classic masters. Not once but twice!! Please fix this issue right away.. please, please

A great game now ruined. Constantly closing after or during a match and sometimes not even starting again. My Asus Z500m should handle it with ease yet I find myself frustrated with problematic behaviour from the game. Fix this. I've been sending feedback for months and nothing has been fixed.

Who made that script, for mobile games it has been the most exciting sports game. I must say it is very complicated specially in the starting but you get addicted to it just for its complications but love to be a manager.. Well done not easy to create such a difficult so deep kind of script.

Let me start by saying awesome game, great graphics playing on and off for years but what's is going on with this game play. Defenders literally running by ball carrier, ridiculous passes by my team and missing clear scoring opportunities. Slowness of my team, no attacking effort, no tackling effort, keeper not even stopping a single shot. Guess I need to just stop playing again. Overall good game just work on the gameplay and AI decision. Uninstalling.

The tide of matches will change based on your management skill.Experience gripping matches in which you are in total control.[Try out your Soccer Theory in Player Training Mode]Train players however you want by assigning them to a quality trainer and the training venue of your choice. descriptionHTML:
This soccer simulation game for the Pro Evolution Soccer series has racked up a total of 28 million downloads from all over the globe.
Major update with the 2017/18 roster included.
New elements such as My Hometown area expansions with new facilities, an online live match mode against members in the same Association, and a ""Limit Break"" feature, which extends the players' potential maximum abilities, have been added in the new version.
This world standard of soccer simulation games will continue to evolve.
Test your soccer management skills in various roles, including as a coach, a scout, and a general manager against rivals from around the world!

[PES Console Game Engine on Mobile Devices]
Enjoy playing realistic soccer matches with high-quality 3D graphics and analyzing tactics in realtime on an animated 2D screen.

[Licenses Around the Globe]
Official licenses for popular European and Southern American teams/leagues are included, with more than 5,000 authentic players.

[Soccer Simulation Enjoyable for Core Strategists (Basic Gameplay All Free)]
Simple controls allow you to easily set tactics during matches. The tide of matches will change based on your management skill.
Experience gripping matches in which you are in total control.

[Try out your Soccer Theory in Player Training Mode]
Train players however you want by assigning them to a quality trainer and the training venue of your choice. You can compete against rivals around the world with the team built under your team concept.

[User-Driven League]
No need to log in at a fixed time. Play each season at your own pace.

[Play the Global Standard of Soccer Games for Free]
Winning matches with your own tactics/skills is more satisfying. Win League/Cup rewards to build your team. Bid for players on the market at the lowest price.

We recommend PES CLUB MANAGER if you:
・For those who want to construct a great stadium that will be iconic to the club's fans, just like how Borussia Dortmund did.
・Possess a soccer philosophy like FC BARCELONA.
・For those who are attracted to clubs like Borussia Dortmund, a team that contributes to their hometown and is loved by their local fans.
・Believe tradition is important for a soccer club.
・Think a soccer club can become something more than a ""club"".
・Believe ""winning in a style"" is the ideal victory.
・Think soccer is all about tactics.
・Want to manage a dream team with your favorite players.
・Want to become an owner of a soccer club with a long history.
・Want to test out new soccer tactics.
・Are curious about young soccer stars.
・Are curious about mid-season transfers.
・Watch national matches.
・Root for young players in international tournaments.
・Think training young generations is important.
・Think philosophy is necessary for strong clubs.
・Soccer is your favorite sport.


* PES CLUB MANAGER is a free-to-play app. No purchases are required. All users can play the entire game free of charge, although purchasing PES Coins can speed up gameplay and help to strengthen your club faster. In-app purchases can be disabled by “limiting in-app billing” on the device used.

Required OS: Android 4.2.0 or later
*Operation is not guaranteed on other OSes.

Compatible devices:
https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#compatibilty
*Please note that support is not offered in response to inquiries that involve non-compatible devices.

This is an online game only. Users must be connected to the internet (3G,4G,or Wi-Fi) to play. Internet connection charges may be incurred separately depending on the user's network environment.
Use of this app requires agreement to the app’s Terms of Use, Virtual Currency Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.

License Rights:
https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#license

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.

comments: Nice Game! At the start its easy, like many players said, but maybe they didnt stick through to further their games,I believe the easy start is needed to build for the later part of the games specially if you are a f2p player. Though being F2P isnt as bad here as it is on other games (speaking from experience). I like thier new updates now and specially the "sweep" requirement. Thanks Devs! my only hope is that please make planting/ crops a little easier on us common folks,it gets a little bit tiring to have to press from seed>plant repeat (depending on your available field). Anyway, besides this i do not regret playing the game, easy controls, f2p friendly, graphics is good, controls are good. Keep up the good work devs!looking forward to more updates
For the love of God let me grammar check your game...
Very nice and addictive game, i like it.  Would be nicer if pvp is already availble
Nice game. I just hope more free diamonds to be given during quests :)
I love the game but what happened to pk cus you guys are an different company

Downloaded the game just to see LoL heroes like Ahri and Sona on action only to found out most of them in preview screenshots doesn't exist in-game. But overall a fun game and f2p friendly.  Edit: upped my rating to 5 after 5 days playing, you guys deserve it. Keep up the good work. :)

comments: I would love to be able to play the game again.  The new update has now given me minimal play time as it continuously crashes.  Like I would've thought that the crashing problem would've been fixed by now,  but it just gets worse every day.

It's great! Stop spamming me to rate!! [ Edit ] Okay, I guess at the beginning it did it a lot more but eventually slowed down. Would be nice if it just stopped entirely after rating. I've raised my rating by 1 star.
This game crashes more than drunk drivers on a Saturday night. It was the fun the first day but a day later it crashes without even getting through the loading screen?? Fix your game.
Well made game, lovely graphics, and not very pay-to-win. I love it. Never encountered any of the bugs/crashes the others mentioned so I can't say much about that. It's a smooth experience for me.
So many crashes. Daily 50-100. I cant take this anymore. I think I might quit if this problem will not be resolved. Cache cleared many times. This game is not worth daily constant crashes.

Enjoyable on every front EXCEPT when I receive fb messenger notifications and I use the "quick reply" without opening the app, the keyboard slides the entire application up half way and after I send it takes up to 30 seconds to correct itself if it does at all.  Idk but maybe make it so it allows over lay of keyboards? Or whatever coding nightmare that might bring...just figured I'd mention it

comments: This game relies on internet connection far too much to actually be able to play while traveling. I have been disconnected several times in the middle of getting the golden statues, so it not only takes my tickets (which are hard to come by), it also doesn't give me the golden statue when I won it and the internet went down.
I love the game but three times now it has not given me my diploma for jobs I passed in Hawaii with is keeping me from moving on to the next level.  It's very frustrating.
Nice idea but crashes too often. I like the way you can travel to different countries and learn about different places. Unfortunately it crashes too often

I spent a good amount of time today trying to figure out why I was not getting job diplomas. I pass the quizzes with enough points but it doesn't give me the diploma. I even updated the game just in case. Advice?

Super fun game, play as much as you like, don't have to spend money, travel around the world and learn about different cultures. Usually only very minor loading issues but probably because of my own connection. Add more diplomas!
How do I use vip travel card? It was said that it cover all the trips, but when I want to travel, I have to buy a ticket. I dont understand the purpose of tbe card.
description: Your bag is packed and you‚Äôre ready to go, but as fate has it, you‚Äôre stranded in Rome with only 500 coins in your pocket. What now?Show the world what you‚Äôre made of in Backpacker, a new globetrotting trivia game! Save up enough money to continue your travels by going on various missions and applying for odd jobs! At the end of each day, either splurge on a hotel or risk sleeping in the streets. Discover new cities and maybe even learn a thing or two along the way.Backpacker Features* Test your trivia skills!        * See the world, one city at a time!* Complete your memento collection with tokens from each city! * Collect job diplomas and earn cash for traveling!        * Help strangers around the world for secret rewards! * Stamp your passport in each city, can you collect them all? * Which mini game will become your new favourite?"Conquer the world, become a Backpacker!Backpacker has been lovingly created, we take fun seriously.Join a global audience of more than 100 million players and check out some of our other chart-topping hit games like Ruzzle, Wordalot or WordBrain 2!We really value your feedback, go to www.facebook.com/BackpackerGame and say what's on your mind!More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.comGood Times!
descriptionHTML:
Your bag is packed and you’re ready to go, but as fate has it, you’re stranded in Rome with only 500 coins in your pocket. What now?

Show the world what you’re made of in Backpacker, a new globetrotting trivia game!
Save up enough money to continue your travels by going on various missions and applying for odd jobs!
At the end of each day, either splurge on a hotel or risk sleeping in the streets.
Discover new cities and maybe even learn a thing or two along the way.

Backpacker Features

* Test your trivia skills!
* See the world, one city at a time!
* Complete your memento collection with tokens from each city!
* Collect job diplomas and earn cash for traveling!
* Help strangers around the world for secret rewards!
* Stamp your passport in each city, can you collect them all?
* Which mini game will become your new favourite?"

Conquer the world, become a Backpacker!

Backpacker has been lovingly created, we take fun seriously.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires!
There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends.

★ BUILD literally anything – castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!
★ JOIN OUR ENORMOUS COMMUNITY - millions of players are waiting for you!
★ PLAY THOUSANDS OF MINI GAMES from parkour and races to PVP battles and ghost hunting!
★ UNIQUE crafting process! PLANT seeds, SPLICE seeds, GROW trees - find your own way to create rare items!
★ MONTHLY UPDATES! We do our best to entertain you with exciting monthly updates involving new items and events!
★ EXPLORE countless unique worlds - you can enter any of them!
★ CROSS PLATFORM! Play anywhere – on any of your mobile devices or using the desktop client, - the progress is shared!


BE AWARE! This is an online game about collecting items – make sure to keep them safe
** Note: This is a freemium game that has optional In-App Purchases! **
Note: In-App Purchase, Chat, and Tapjoy Offer Wall options can be disabled in a Personal Controls area in the Options menu.

Didn't get your gems or having a problem? Email us at support@growtopiagame.com, we'd love to help!

descriptionHTML:
The all-new Captain Tsubasa mobile game is now available!
Pick your favourite players, create your own unique dream team, and battle it out against other users from around the world!

Incredible Special Skills for that authentic "Captain Tsubasa" experience!
Tsubasa Ozora's Drive Shot... Kojiro Hyuga's Tiger Shot... All the different special skills from the original series are recreated in stunning 3D! You won't want to miss the character cut-ins and voices, either!

Intense Matches
The game controls are optimized for smartphones, creating a smooth, intuitive, and stress-free play experience! Compete with other teams to become master of the pitch and conquer the world of football!

Re-experience the original story in Story Mode!
Experience the thrill of the original series once more in Story Mode! Take yourself back to Tsubasa's middle school days and relive some nostalgic memories!

Team Editing
Your players, team formation, kit, and so forth can all be freely customized, allowing you to create your own completely unique dream team!

Power up your players!
Train your players and power them up! It's also possible to transfer special skills between the same character! Use your powered-up players to develop your own original strategies, then use them to show your rivals what you're made of!

[Get all the latest info about the app!]
Official Site
https://www.tsubasa-dreamteam.com/en/

About Access Requests
[Permission to access external storage]
Access is required in order to save game data to external storage.
* If using Android 6.0 or above, the app can be used even if access is not granted.

©Yoichi Takahashi/SHUEISHA ©Yoichi Takahashi/SHUEISHA/TV TOKYO/ENOKIFILM

description: Carnival for 3rd anniversary is now live !What could warm heroes up in this cold winter ? The answer is simple, a big anniversary gift for All Veterans (characters been created for three years). Come join the Pet Edge of Survival Mode, the brand new battle-royale PvP contest where only one can own his victory ! Strengthen your pets with 2 Anima Stone slots to help you in the adventure ! Battle through unique levels wielding blades, magic, and fists to bash enemies into oblivion with a fun, fast-paced action combat system. descriptionHTML:
Carnival for 3rd anniversary is now live !
What could warm heroes up in this cold winter ? The answer is simple, a big anniversary gift for All Veterans (characters been created for three years). Come join the Pet Edge of Survival Mode, the brand new battle-royale PvP contest where only one can own his victory ! Strengthen your pets with 2 Anima Stone slots to help you in the adventure ! Activate Dikpala seals and find out the true power of your talisman ! Are you ready for the carnival hot wave on the vast land of Avzar ?

Touch Arcade – “A stand-out in RPG genre!”

App Advice – “An intense and fast-paced dungeon crawler!”

148 Apps – “Make this the Year of the Panda!”

Inside X Game*Spark – “Best of Social/Mobile E3 2015”

==Features==

The Journey Begins

Grab your sword and battle hordes of crazy creatures, magical mysteries, and sinister specters on an action-filled journey to become the ultimate legend! Prove you have what it takes in a goofy and thrilling action adventure MMO rendered with PC game quality 3D graphics and full-body motion capture technology.

Slash Through Opponents

True power lies within, unleash your hero and fight through to infinity! Battle through unique levels wielding blades, magic, and fists to bash enemies into oblivion with a fun, fast-paced action combat system. Master the unique skills of 8 distinct heroes to defeat enemies and become the ultimate champion of Avzar!

Discover Powerful Gear

Build up a powerful hero through strength and cunning in an RPG adventure! Collect and upgrade gear, skills, pets and mounts to increase your might and unlock your inner potential. Do you have what it takes to become a Taichi Legend?

Battle Online and Rule the Land

Join in online PvP and co-op with other players! Take on powerful bosses, and become a hero alongside allies in Team Instances. Battle in the arena, join Guilds for online Guild competition and co-op, or enter the fray in 25v25 Battle Royale PvP. Capture territory in Warpath, and rise to the top in team arena PvP League!

==Connect==

Visit our official site to learn more about Taichi Panda: http://panda.snail.com/en
Join the Taichi Panda community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/TaichiPandaOfficial
Community Forum: http://pandabbs.snail.com/
developerAddress: 1424 Lincoln Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90401, USA

comments: I love your latest update! Also thank you for fixing the "internet connection lost" issue! üòä Love the new character by the way! *-*)/ Great job!   I do have a suggestion, can you add like a one park/any place where players can meet with other players and chat? It would be great to interact with other players, not just in your guild group üòä hoping you'll consider it. Thank you so much for making this game! So addicting!

It'll be nice if we earn those ITEMS given in the stages description.  I kept on earning only common item no epic or legendary.  Which is sad but game is smooth which is good.  Thank you google for the update.  If we may add would love an auto healing potion during adventure. Thank you

Edit: Issue was resolved and devs were very quick to reply and help, which they seem to do consistently. I really love this game because it's easy to get good equipment and currency, you aren't forced to pay to win. Rewards for login/quests are very generous, prices of cards to equip new items isn't unreasonable. The characters and items you can equip look stunning. The only thing I can criticise is the unbalanced PvP, but I solve that by not playing PvP lol.

Marvelous heroes, outstanding graphics, excellent costumes, and cute pets. I realy like this game. But I hope this game would turn into an open world where all players could see each other at a single area. Perhaps a town or some kind of a city where everyone could gather and more features like whispers, world chat, etc. Well aside from that the game is totally amazing. Would much likely recommend this game.

Great game beside the fact it is a memory-eater this is exactly what you expect from cell game in 2018 good graphic smooth gameplay and enough energy reward not to worry about beeing stpp because of a lack of it. The omly downside is the pvp which is build in a way you are up against player who 1HKO you which get pretty frustrating.

Can't play the game after the latest update. I've downloaded the latest update, able to play it for few minutes. Then, it stop responding. When I tried to relaunch, after the Google Play Store and Nexus logo, it just stuck on the black screen. Nothing happened, waited for 5 minutes, still nothing happened. So I deleted the app and reinstall it. Still stuck on the black screen after the google plastore and nexus logo. Hopefully u guys patch this up ASAP, and I'll gladly change the rating once this is sorted out

comments: Great gameIncredible game. But when you move up in lvls the cost of every detail is ludacris! I've played this game a month and spent good money on it.  I am not into waiting a half a day so I can gain a 5 min advantage, then turn around and do it again. Only this time, just wait longer! .... Or of course you could just spend be re $.... Awesome game... makers are greedy!

I'm not happy that I can only send 20 gold from my accounts to one of my accounts per day. I'd like to send more gold per day. Annoying 2 alliance war battle limit should be gotten rid of. It's annoying, expensive and takes a very long time to reach each level of the game. Overall, it's a good game to play but it can be improved

The last few days this game become completely useless and unplayable. The matchmaking has been tweaked to the point where I'm being attacked by significantly higher players, without even a possibility to retaliate! At the same time when I try to attack in quick match, the level of my opponents is being so high, that I have zero chances winning a simple attack.  I'm thinking about uninstalling this game permanently. When contacted, Zynga employee suggests to spend more money to upgrade my defenses. How is that for "humanly friendly" customer service? Horrible service.
After getting to HQ level 10 it just got so boring.  To be honest don't like the game play playing against other people either.  The play is slanted toward the attacker .  Deleted

It's quite unreasonable that the nuke is too close to other command items! So, please give me back a nuke, and 40000 fuels as well as 5000 metals for reviving robot and retraining tanks! Also put the nuke to other corners!

Game has a fun, friendly community of players. Load times kinda slow. Occational bugs and glitches. Usually following after updates. Overall though a fun game that has new features added frequently, keeping it interesting.

comments: Would of given 5 stars if it wasnt for the 300 energies as it doesnt go very far, would be better if it refilled twice a day instead of once. Why do you have to spend money on special scenes they should be unlocked if you picked the right choices not pay for them. Apart from that love the story and the graphics are great if these issues could be sorted that would be great

I downloaded this due to the narrative and the reviews, but I am not a fan of this game. 300 energies (30 sentences) is very short I get through it in about 3 minutes and then you wait an entire 24hours for another. I love the storyline and the graphics so therefore this would be good for someone who is a slower reader. It's a shame but I will be uninstalling.

Wish there was more energy or like an easier way to get more energy. I get 450 energy for the day with the initial 300 and playing the mini game which gives 100 and watching the adds which is 50. But it's not enough I feel like I only get about a couple sentences in and then I run out. Maybe if you could play the mini game every hour or two to get the 100 energy and watch the ads around the same time to get 150 instead of waiting 24 hrs it would be better. The story progresses too slowly with that little amount.

The game has me hooked. I'm big on reading so I fly through the 300 energies. I've spent $10 repeatedly, even $20 for energy and it feels like it was gone in the same amount of time as the 300 energies. If you allowed maybe 4 refills a day, it would be amazing, or some other way, maybe to just keep playing the minigame. There has to be something more other than 20 energies for a video once a day. But despite the lack of energy, this game has me so disgustingly hooked. I love it so much.

I think this game is really good. I just have one problem. Even though it says my energy is full, it feels like I have nothing. And also the mini game 100 energy seems to last longer than the initial 300 you receive. If you could fix this taht would be great. And if it's designed like this can you make energy spending more efficient?

This game really addictive!! The only problem is they don't give you enough energy.üòíyou either have to buy energy or play a mini game to get more energy. The highest energy points that you can get is 100. Plus the 30 points if you watch a video. Other than that the game is AMAZING. The graphics are realistic. It has a lot of romance too. You should definitely download this game if you're not bothered about the energy points.

comments: üíñLOVE THIS GAME!  BEAUTIFUL, STUNNING GRAPHICS on each level. Continues to the next story line and game level without any ads. Only issue it keeps freezing up on me as a new player to this game. I hope I don't have to uninstall it as  its the best came I've come across that I have truely enjoyed. To many games on Google play with kiddie themes. This one is just what I've been looking for. I üíñüíñüíñüíñ it. But if it keeps freezing up I'll have no choice but to uninstall it. How sad that would be.

Game is not fun at all. You spend too much time looking for stuff that it won't give you, not to mention that you need to match 5 gems to get any kind of special gem unlike other match 3 games where you get a special gem when you match 4 or more gems. If they change that I will be willing to give it another try. But until then I'm uninstalling the game and won't reinstall again.

I wasn't expecting to like this game but I started it 3 hours ago and I'm still playing so it must have something good about it or I wouldn't still be here. I'm more of a play a few min and move on. It has pretty graphics, and nice story line.

I love this game! The graphics are awesome and the games themselves are difficult but winnable. Just don't plan on playing through it very rapidly. The only complaint I have is that the story line is disjointed and sometimes difficult to keep track of. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes match 3 games.
Great game, nice to play. But too many instructions to play makes this game BORED. Waste a lot of time. Sorry to say, I just uninstall.

It is ok and worth a download. I am at level 36. The first 10 levels took two hours, then it got hard to make progress.  This is greedware requiring many $100s to play very long. The initial game plays over an hour, then becomes tedious and time-consuming. It is fine to play when on the toilet in the morning, and that seems appropriate. Mostly, this is just another match three game with excellent graphics and a modest story. Skip all the side games, those just waste resources prompting you to buy time or resources for real cash.  Never waste jewels to keep playing as there are unlimited replays only requiring you to wait for more energy to slowly but for free to build up for the next day's 15 minutes of play. The rewards for playing daily go at least for a year, so it takes a long time to finish.

descriptionHTML:
When boring, uninventive match-3 puzzles prevail and all hope is lost, it all comes down to one single game … Cradle of Empires! Become the Chosen One and help the ancient empire rise from the ruins in this adventurous match-3 game with a rich storyline, thrilling quests and captivating characters!

Cradle of Empires is an exciting — yet cool, calm and collected — family-friendly adventure. It takes you on a breathtaking odyssey that challenges your matching, building and collecting skills. With the help from Nimiru and Egyptian settlers, you can break the Amrun’s curse and restore the ancient civilization to its former glory. Step up and become the secret weapon in the triumph of good over evil!

WHAT MAKES THE GAME SPECIAL?

● Unique gameplay mix: You make matches, build a grand city and go on an adventure all in one … How awesome is that?
● Mega-sized adventure: You’ll be immersed in this engaging adventurous story with unexpected twists, gripping quests and memorable characters.
● Ancient cities and civilizations: You collect resources by playing match-3 levels, which help you rebuild the cities that evil had destroyed.
● Different game modes: You play 6 different match-3 modes, a variety you won’t find anywhere else.
● Many power-ups: You can earn a diversity of bonuses, power-ups and amulets — you’ll develop your own strategy for using them.
● Regular updates: You’ll never run out of new adventures as you’ll get new buildings, quests, bonuses, levels and whole civilizations in future updates.

All this and much, much more for FREE!

Get Ready for the holidays - Festive updates

STAY TUNED

comments: Between the guessing games for expansion parts and having to be glued to the game all day everyday and worrying about getting demoted if you actually have a job and family obligations...this game is getting old. Then you are playing against people who spend a ton of money and have unlimited time to play. So I'd you have a life you're getting demoted or not going anywhere. In general I'm sick of this game. I'll find something else.
It's nice but sometimes I can't connect with my friends. I can't buy goods from my friends and buddies club
Its stress reliever for me and it was good to play the game is so exciting
I've never been the kind of person to have games on my phone. Ever. Then my fiancee got me hooked on it. Great when your just laying in bed at night until you get tired. Very addicting.
No benefits, can't buy what ya need, to hard to get guides, everything cost to much!!!!!
Its awesome keep up the good work
description: Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games in this colorful free-to-play game from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise! Adventure unfolds all around your island! ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS - Trade with other players using the trade boat - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands - Have too many pineapples? Name your price and sell off extra crops and crafts - The more coins you have, the more you can do on your island ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES ‚Ä¢ For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at¬†http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.‚Ä¢ This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game.¬†Social Networking Service terms may also apply.‚Ä¢ The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $99.99.‚Ä¢ You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from Zynga Inc and its partners. Adventure unfolds all around your island!

ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting

*THE TURTLE NESTING event is here! Watch out for Mama Turtles appearing on your beaches, and tend turtle nests to get the hatchlings safely to the ocean. Get help from globe-trotting film-makers, Jack and Kerry McLeod, and meet their adorable dog, Laika!

comments: WOW. This game has everything! My only complaint is that the "earning" free in game currency section (downloading and playing other games to certain level), does not yield in game currency, so do not bother. Just pay for stuff when it goes on sale. But otherwise, WOW! This is like fanfic, sims, empire, battle, idle, all in one! Hpw often do you get an all in one game based off an amazing franchise?? (As of this date, ive been playing for 2 months, spent $10)

I reckon this is the best game in the world!! I am a enormous fan of how to train your dragon, so i reckon you have done an awesome job at making this game. But, the only problem is i don't like the part when it loads and takes forever, and sometimes it doesn't even load and yo have to use wifi and takes up alot of storage on your device. So i sugest decreasing those things or stopping those things.

First everything went out smoothly. Now the assets keeps on redownloading everytime I try to play it. My phone still has 7gb free memory, I also tried following ghe suggestion to clear up some space it still doesn't work. But overall it was awesome. I just hope the issue of redownloading will get fixed asap.

When you complete a level in the currently available adventure, you may spin a wheel. Why do I always get resources? Do I seriously need 18 cards worth of resources, each card worth approximately 1 million fish or wood? Please tweek the chances of getting something else! I don't even mind getting lots of sage fruit at this point... At least it would be useful. Resources aren't really useful when you are filled up on resources.

Love the game. Just wish it gave a little more direction on what and how to do certain things. And wish you didn't have to wait hours sometimes 19 to hatch an egg. But they do give you the option to pay to speed up the process. Also wish that they weren't so stingy with giving ruins/coins to pay for things they ask you to do.

Love it! I downloaded this for my kids who love the movies and TV series, but I've become addicted! I've spent a bit of money over the roughly 6-9 months I've had it, but I haven't minded. The earn free runes has created issues in random phone calls and spam emails, so I don't use that anymore.   I agree with someone else's comment about the Book of Dragons - I found it much easier previously. Also, I've had a red number on mine for weeks and I still can't work out what it's for...I've searched through the book, I'm searching for dragons when I can, and still no idea what it's about.   I keep getting the download new assets but I know that's because my phone is full and I can't delete anything else LOL. I'm looking to upgrade my phone soon so hopefully it will stop that.  Overall, it's definitely a game I'd recommend (and I have). Thanks.

descriptionHTML:
***Reached No.1 App in Over 85 Countries!***

Build your OWN Berk! Rescue, hatch and train your favorite DreamWorks Dragons! Explore uncharted lands in a vast Viking world!

Join Hiccup, Toothless and the gang to protect your village from the mysterious strangers that threaten peace on Berk. Who are they? And, what do they want from your harmonious homeland? Train your DreamWorks Dragons successfully and they’ll reveal new powers that will help to ensure the future of your island.

Remember…it takes a village...and DRAGONS!

Features:
• Discover all your favorite DreamWorks Dragons from the movie, including Toothless, Stormfly, Hookfang and Skullcrusher
• Collect and grow over 350 different Dragon species, like Deadly Nadders, Monstrous Nightmares and Typhoomerangs
• Complete missions with all the characters from DreamWorks Dragons
• Stunning visual & audio effects with 3D animations

This is YOUR Berk. It's time to RISE!

* Please note: Rise of Berk is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

comments: Would be ZERO STARS. Lost my account and no way to retrieve it. Piece or garbage app I spent money to support and now it is gone. Not even able to try to retrieve my account. Just forces me to start over. What a garbage game. Don't waste your time since it is so easy to lose everything. ZERO STARS! Avoid this game like the plague. No customer service and you will just be a farm for other players. ZERO STARS
Pay to win, it seems. Similar to King of Avalon: Dragon Warfare (or whatever it was called).  Ditched them both now. KoA draws you in, but then you become fodder for the big spenders.

It looks good BUT so geared to paying extra it's pointless, just purely money driven, got less than hour before realizing everything is pay for! I paid a bit so didn't expect for free. Don't waste your life and money. No advancement without paying, constant cry for cash. Shameful.

shows homm5 gameplay in the trailer. something completely different in the actual game. i wonder if false advertising applies to f2p games. still its generic time sink and a reskin of those mobile "strategy" games that are all the same thing
Tons of fun, frustrating at first cuz you get constantly attacked by armies way stronger than you, but that passes and you actually get to enjoy the game after that. Very much like HOMM 3
Error code 3 always appears on the hero trial. What does it mean?

descriptionHTML:
Bored with typical MMO Strategy game play? Play War and Magic! Every action counts for battle victory.

It’s time to show your strategic mind and capture the legendary honors in the most exciting REAL TIME MMO ACTION STRATEGY GAME! The well-designed battle system may challenge your strategic and tactical thinking. Command every action of your troops and every decision counts in the battles. Power is no longer the key to victory, but tactics and strategy.

Ally with worldwide players and fight for the highest throne in this magic world. Build an empire with advanced technologies and structures. Protect your homeland and fight against enemies with legendary heroes and powerful troops. Support each other within the alliance and fight for the honors together. Only the winners from the clash could be commemorated as legends!

FREE to play! Get it now!


Real Time Tactics and Strategy
- Improved game play for chessboard battlefield – every strategic action counts!
- Strategically mix and match various heroes and soldiers for powerful troops.

Build an Empire

comments: BEWARE!  They will take the system down and give you when it will be back up.  Only problem is they bring it up before the advertised time.  Meaning you are left vulnerable.  They do not follow their own rules.  They do not compensate players for their mistakes.  They let Chinese player buy packs cheaper and use at accounts.  If you are a Westerner do not play or pay on this game.  Their customer service sucks.  They actually try to get you to feel sorry for them.  Its amazing.  They will only steal from you.

This is definitely a pay to win game.  And I agree with previous reviews saying it favors Chinese players.  The developers claim it's not, but if it wasn't true, then why are 99% of the servers dominated by Chinese players?  Plus the Chinese to English translations are terrible.  You will barely understands what they're saying.
The game could use more tool tips and information to properly explain all of the content. If I hadn't played a similar style game before this would be difficult to understand for a beginner.

The graphics are great and the game play is interesting but it's very independent to new players; from other players as well as the system itself. Like things that have been improved on in this genre of game in other apps are still frustrating here. Oh well, what can I expect from a freemium game? Overall it's enjoyable but I have to take it in doses; basically until I get frustrated by the gameplay or other players. All in all, there are worse was to spend your time.

Great game. Gold prize is high but there is a weekly pack that is fair prize. Ive played the game for over a year now and the devs are good when it comes to improvemennts to the game. I am still waiting on a visual change to the ark home screen and a beter view on the map screen.   All in All i love this game.

I love this game. Can you bring more ppl in ...is same like so little ppl in the server... Also please reduce the price for item that using gold or can you speed up the gathering time for resources... So we can have more fun
description: - Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!I built, I sailed, I conquered!Join the battle NOW!With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.Mighty Space Arks- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.Ultimate Galactic Military Power- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.MMO Strategic Gameplay- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. descriptionHTML:
- Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!
- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!

I built, I sailed, I conquered!
Join the battle NOW!

With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.

Mighty Space Arks
- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.
- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.
- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.

Ultimate Galactic Military Power
- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.
- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.
- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.

MMO Strategic Gameplay
- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.
- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.
- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. Use diplomacy to establish the order of your world.
- Trade your equipment and resources with other players and become a space merchant.

comments: I enjoy playing! Daily Quest could be better. (I don't get the daily magic wheel) But they have events to earn stuff. And I absolutely love my lil pets and their powers üòä and the ingame friends I have are helpful. edited: I completed a purchase and did not recieve anything like the quest said I would. Also developers never responded to my email regarding something else. I've spent $40 bucks on this game in the 1st few days I've been playing and I think I'll keep my lil money to myself now since they haven't fixed the issue.

Would give 5 stars but after you get to a certain level you have to spend real money to get farther. I have spend 65 dollars on this game so far and have been scammed so many times. Its a super fun game but so hard to get anywhere. You should be able to stock up shields. Also its stupid that you have to pay to talk. I might get the VIP if some things changed.

The problem I have is you haven't given the radio toy for the bear and also you can't unfreeze the guy because you don't give out the items to do it even after defeating the monster. You still can't get enough fire logs plus still no radio toy for the bear? Plus should give more coins it is a lot in higher levels

Losing some snowballs...... Would like to get more than six spins in one hour..... especially when there are large amounts needed to buy..... Mining pigs....really so much when we pay large amounts and our pay is so low.....

I helped my friend defeating leonardo.i used 10 bombs .but when i attacked leonardo .there was still 1 % left .so someone else had complited it.and now i went there to claim reward there was no reward for me.i have not claimed that reward. 2nd thing you have made puzzle number 9 so much rare not even me but everyone is not getting it. Please fix this.i will give 5 stars back.

Loved this game my planet gets distroyed everyday once I almost get it built. I played several times all day. Loved this game. I used to get angels but not any more. Been on same island for weeks. I love building my planet so fun. But not getting distroyed a minutes later. I've noticed alot of my friends stopped playing too due to same problem. üò•

descriptionHTML:
***Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers***

Piggy:" Lords and Ladies, one of your friends just attacked your island, you must commit revenge! Spin the wheel to earn more gold and shields!" --Invite your Facebook friends to join Piggy Boom!

Build your exclusive islands of your own with the help of little cute pets, push the button and spin the wheel, win some luck today!

Have fun with other players and steal their gold, protect your island from invasion with your pets

▶Features
• Magic Wheel
Every one loves having some luck in a game and Piggy Boom gives you free daily chances to spin the wheel and win heaps of coins!

• Theme islands
Every casual game players love to build and have a customized avatar!
In Piggy Boom, hundreds of themed islands wait for you to unlock them and build. The more you build, the more islands you will have


• Play with Friends
Invite your best friends and compete with global players. Are you under attack and want a revenge? Call your friends and attack together.

• Miner System
Be a miner and keep digging, a rich gold mine is waiting for you to explore in the game! Become the richest player in the game for a second.

• Cute Pets
Get your daily dose of cuteness with your adorable pets and protect your island together. Remember to feed your cute pet and level it up.

More features for you to find in Piggy Boom. Join us today and play with millions players all over the world!

NOTICE: Items are available for purchase in the game.

In process of the game, we may need permissions listed as below:
1. WRITE/READ EXTERNAL STORAGE
We use this permission to help players send their screenshots to us, in cases when bugs have occurred. This helps us locate where the problem is and solve it.
2. READ/RECEIVE/SEND SMS
We use this permission to verify the identities of users, retrieve accounts, guarantee the safety of accounts, and allow players to share the game to friends at the same time.
3. RECORD_AUDIO
We use this permission to allow players to audio chat in the game.
------------------------------------------
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PiggyBoomApp/

descriptionHTML:
Battle enemy pirates and join a pirate alliance to dominate the ocean. Dive into epic quests with your favorite pirates and relive their tales in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War.

In this real-time strategy game, you’re the captain of your own pirate haven. Build your pirate base and recruit notorious marauders to join your mighty corsairs. Battle supernatural creatures and fearsome pirates to dominate the ocean!!

Relive the classic stories from Pirates of the Caribbean and battle alongside some of your favorite pirates like Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner and many more. Join them in epic quests on the high tides in the story mode.

Become the most cunning and fearless pirate that ever lived in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War!

Game Features:

THE OCEAN IS YOURS TO RULE
✔ Start your adventure in the most original pirate war game!
✔ Become a legendary pirate captain and choose your own portrait.
✔ Obtain equipment to customize and strengthen your captain.

BUILD YOUR PIRATE BASE
✔ Build a powerful fleet and recruit fearless pirates for the battles to come.
✔ Build and defend your base from incoming enemy pirates looking to loot your resources.

PREPARE FOR A PIRATE BATTLE ROYALE
✔ Plunder your enemies to become the one and only PIRATE CAPTAIN of the Caribbean.
✔ Plan out assaults against millions of other pirates from all around the world.
✔ Dominate the ocean by creating or joining a pirate alliance and assemble an unstoppable force.
✔ Battle against supernatural creatures and other sea rovers on the open seas.

RELIVE THE ADVENTURES OF CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW
✔ Immerse yourself into the story mode.
✔ Dive into EPIC QUESTS featuring Pirates of the Caribbean movie plots and characters.
✔ Partake in the great tales of favorite pirates like Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner, Captain Barbossa and more!

Download now to start your Pirates of the Caribbean adventure!

Customer Support: https://tidesofwar.zendesk.com/hc/en-us
Terms of Service & Privacy Policy: http://policy.joycity.com/en

◆Access Authorizations in JOYCITY Games
1. Access to Make and Manage Phone Calls (READ_PHONE_STATE)
(When the game starts) It is essential to be able to identify the device for Guest Login (immediate start). Access to [Make and Manage Phone Calls] includes information to identify the device, and you will be unable to login to the game if you deny the access request.

2. Access to Photos, Media, and Files (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
(When game updating) We need your permission to save the update files onto your device's SD card. [Pictures, Media, File Access] includes the authority to access SD card. If you refuse the request, you will be unable to login.

* Phrases used in [ ] may differ based on the device and OS version

comments: Stuff stuff goody good good forensic anthropology your pizza up your potato juice ham sandwich with homework for your face mouth nose elbow skin football Olympic gold karrot. Tough to install, took me about 5 ham sandwiches until this thing fuannlay installed. This piece of shananagins went down a water stream faster than your baby TV

If you like base building war strategy games then please download this app. It's an game that has constantly going back. Although you have many in app purchases available you can play without spending any real money and be competitive. The developers award you with more than enough items on a daily basis. It's definitely a must have for fans of this game type.

I'm sure this is a fun game, however I do not see the reason why it needs to have permission to manage my phone calls or know my location if I never plan to use any online abilities. That is just too much access to my phone. I did not even get a chance to play the game because it wanted that access on start up; it will not allow you to play the game without give permission.

It's a great strategic game. PvP is more event driven rather than a free for all.Great value for the money you spend whether it's a little or a lot...and the purchases give a little free to your team. Lots of ways to win free stuff and points you can spend on items needed in alliance store and keep up with your wallet warrior team mate. One downside is the support..they can be a little sliw in response time to problems. But they don't just ignore you either.

Why does this app request access to make calls/read sms/messages? Un-installed right away.  Edit: That's not how it works. Just because you say "your phone is safe" doesn't make it safe. You're still getting the permission from un-educated users that you can read their messages. That's very shady.

it was a good game but after playing it a month the server has errors. I lost 50% of my troops in my main castle which went missing, lost 1 m of power, my farms was plundered and troops in my farms was massacred. Reported the issue but they ROK did not bother to give me a courtesy reply so if you decide to play but sure the system does not steal your time and effort playing the game.  Plus the added frustration
description: Our brand new hero system is just around the corner! In the ever turbulent land of ROK war is here, there... everywhere. People are suffering from war and pain. In these, the most crucial of times, a group of heroes must rise up! They are a group of the most gifted people and the most magical of creatures coming! With their tremendous talent, they will turn the tide in battle or play a pivotal role in your Castle development. Choose the heroes you yearn for in the new update, and have them join the fight against you enemies!  The Great Dragon casts his shadow across the land...In Rise of the Kings, players from all over the world battle to rule this new epic real time strategy game online. Utilizing the best of theRTS, RPG, and MMO gaming genres, take your place in this epic war game as one of many Lords fighting for survival in a hostile fantasy world. In this army game you hold the fate of your kingdom, your army, and yourself firmly in your hands. Tap and install this mobile game to train an army to clash with evil in the best online empire game available! Rally your friends and engage in epic clashes against determined enemies and fearsome foes. Utilize clever strategy, superior leadership, and cunning diplomacy, to rise to the top and claim the crown and the throne. Download this top fantasy RTS MMO today on your phone or tablet and begin playing online with players from around the world! Amass Your Army - Gather friends, old and new, and form a top Alliance to conquer the best new war strategy game available. - Build your empire and train an army, then lead them in PVP war against friends, new and old! - Train your army, lead them into battle, and crush your enemies.Explore the Wild Lands! - Stalk the monster clans roaming the lands and dungeons, and kill them to sharpen your skills and claim their treasure. - Explore the dark dungeons inside the Ruins of the old Kings, and face down the Dark Guards to uncover the riches of the ancients. A King will Rise - If you love PvP challenges, then prove your mettle against the best Lords in the Realm. - Grow faster, build faster, train faster, and then put it all on the line against the terrifying Orcs, the ghastly Grimm Raider Clan, and more as you clash with other ambitious Lords. - Do you have what it takes to Rise and become King? Shoot us a message at servicerok@onemt.com with any questions or comments relating to this wicked multiplayer strategy war game. Ask us anything! Also, connect with Rise of the Kings and friends:https://www.facebook.com/RiseoftheKings

descriptionHTML:
Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist

Do you dream of coaching a team of eleven stars hungry to be champions? New, free soccer club sim Top Soccer Manager puts sports fans like you in charge! Bid on and scout for top players, build and train a team with special skills, test tactics and formations against real opponents from around the world, and watch the match in live 3D simulation.

BEAUTIFUL GAMEPLAY
Top Soccer Manager's immersive 3D graphics and a powerful game engine bring your coaching fantasy to life. Watch stunning games play out in real time as you command your eleven players or bet on other matches in your league. Every goal is a step further on your journey to victory.

MANAGE & TRAIN YOUR SQUAD
As club head, you will test different formations, adjusting player line-up and tactics during play in response to your opponent. Pick a promising player to groom into a hero with special skills to score in the ultimate showdown. Build a team of champs to climb the leader board.

HUNT FOR STAR PLAYERS
Hunt for players to meet your team’s needs. Bid against other soccer managers to win golden boys in the market, recruit all-stars with an agent, or use scouts to find young hopefuls you can make into tomorrow’s legends. Transfer players who no longer fit your strategy.

RICH MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE
Face off against real opponents from around the world in league games. Give your team unique style with officially-authorized jerseys from Premier League, La Liga，Primeira Liga, Bundesliga, MLS. Grow your network of friends, exchange gifts, and grow team experience through friendly matches. Create or join a Soccer Association to gain more rewards.

For any issues or suggestions please contact us at https://gamegou.helpshift.com

comments: I think it is a great game and great concept. Then in the stories characters would send pictures and videos. Great except you have to pay to see them. Not pay and boom you see stuff permanently, but its a weekly, monthly, or yearly thing like its a PlayStation plus account. There are ways of making money without doing this, its called advertisements. Yea they are annoying but they work. I would rather deal with ads and experience the full game then have the game be free but I have to pay for parts locked behind a pay wall. Aside from that the game is great.

Well the reason I put a zero on the graphics was bc I didn't get to see them.üò¢ I just wanted to let you know that I want to request a update on the game maybe just like let people see the video chats and not the pictures. It was really hard knowing what it was talking about. Overall I like it!üòÄ

I love these stories because they're  breathe taking, mysterious, juicy, horrifying, gruesome and just amazing. I find clifhanger inspiring because it gives me bazaar ideas for when I want to write a horra story. However, I don't like the idea of paying because when I first downloaded this app I read the first story and while I was reading the story a blurred picture appeared so I was so excited but when I went to click on it, it said I hat to pay which was quite disappointing but other then that I feel like this app was a realy good idea I feel like it was well made well organised and well planned

I understand this would be good entertainment for some, but honestly the set up you have is bad. having to pay multiple time to see a video or anything that is added as an extra is bad enough, having wait time are worse. On top of all of it the stories are lack luster. Please fix it.
I love the app it's amazing. I advise u to download it but pls put ads bc u have to wait 14 mins I mean I'd rather watch ads than wait 14mins it just makes me angry.

Love the whole concept, great how the phone actually rings like someone is calling you. Sadly this main novelty is hidden behind a subscription wall. Advertisements I can deal with but a subscription I point blank refuse.

comments: Finally a mobile mmo that actually feels like a real mmorpg. Nice graphics, skills, open world questing, lots of players. Fights are engaging  and boss fights are spectacular and interactive. You do need a team for dungeons and raids as you can't just 1 shot everything, like in other mobile mmos. I've tried loads but this is the best by far! Keep it up!

Man, this is a perfect 5/7! Out of a crapton of Mu Origin game clones, this is even better than original! Polished graphics, nice player skills set, awesome UI items layout - everything is top notch! The only thing I can wish for is adding camera turn on top of player strafe via joystick. Thanks for the hard work, and please keep it up!

Great mobile MMO! Good graphics and narration so the story stays interesting. Additionally...SO much Co-op and PvP and a lot of things to give an edge. Not P2P dominated either so far. Obviously the grind to 55 is tough but I have a few characters on different servers there still very possible.

I think this game is amazing for an MMO mobile. It has a feeling of blade and soul and WOW and the graphics sre amazing on my Razer phone! Actually feels like a real MMO, and I like that there are character voices.  Only problem I am having is whenever I go to turn the Volume up or down all sound cuts out and won't come back on until i restart the game. So I need to pre-set my volume before launching the game and then not touch the volume while playing.

Love this games good graphic and updated.  But love warrior in any game but in this game warrior are weak in dps. Can u adjust skill  And i spend real money on top up every week but no legend reforge from bp.  How sad to my char. Legend are to far away to me full set legend. I play evryday not to miss anything on event

Overall game nya seru, story lore nya juga, banyak diversity dalam 1 class, hal yg bikin menarik sebenernya banyak hal yg bisa di laku in di game, ga selama nya soal "power character" tapi soal balancing stat sesuai kebutuhan dan juga path yg diambil. sistem dungeon yg berbeda difficulty juga seru a.k.a mythic (jadi inget main world of warcraft), tapi somehow sistem pvp kurang greget 4.5/5

comments: The team solved all my issues. Beautiful game, new twist on an already good concept. Loving it! Can't stop! Addicted!

Very similar to the dark souls style obviously, I'm frikkin loving it, lovely survival style, it's not hard to survive and it has a great, easy functioning gameplay, only flaw is that it doesn't have a female version of the character...big flaw
Great game, wish there was something to gain more energy, and a hp, or energy lvl cap off, max hp should go up like 2hp per lvl gained. Idk more stats that the player can tweak for gameplay
I'm so suprised no other big shots copying this game like everyone did to clash of clan.
Great game, maybe just add a small tutorial please.

I still like the formula (except for the energy, I want to play not wait), but... If you're just going to clone Last Day, you could at least include the character customization and female model. We waited forever for that in LDoE to the point where I quit playing it as Generic Dude and never really got to enjoy it as I would've preferred playing my own gender. Trying to call it an RPG when you have zero customization. While I absolutely love that there's no stupid 24hr horde breaking walls like in LDoE, the Night Guest is also annoying, fast and without warning. The game balancing is a little on the tough side, and if you're going to keep it that way, you could at least make the AI stop camping the border where we ran out of a zone. The spawning-in AI that beeline chases you down happens too frequently, and some enemies keep camping the area if you run to the border. Makes it tough when they're hitting you the moment you try to return. Also, AI "players" spawning and 1-2shotting me out of nowhere with a bastard sword? I'd love new content, but game needs balancing.
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!‚óè EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!‚óè SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don‚Äôt miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.‚óè OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.‚óè BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.‚óè JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.‚óè PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you‚Äôll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.‚óè RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There‚Äôs always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that‚Äôs the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.‚óè SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire‚Äôs ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

title: Grim Soul: Dark Fantasy Survival

comments: Need to turn off hints. Comes up straight after I have my go. Very annoying. I do want to play without hints or delay the timing.
The updates are better, still addictive! Good, fun game, can be annoying at times. Improvements and more rewarding would be to earn coins after a level or when you move on to the next island.
Better than Candy Crush and other Match 3 games!!! One of the few I have stuck with. Awesome graphics and not overly difficult to pass levels!! Great job Dev!
Please bring back the 2√ó animation speed!!! It's so much slower now and makes me boring. We need 2x animation speed!!
I only wish we could get coin rewards every time we either complete a stage or replay it successfully so we could farm our coin amounts faster. Can you allow us to have such feature, please?
What happen to the speed level 2x? It disappear after the update? Please put in back as the current speed level of the game is very slow!

comments: I don't like that strong competitive advantages are behind pay walls. These advantages make PVP almost unplayable because of how unfair it is for those who haven't paid real world money for them. Also, one of my fully upgraded non-starter ships was completely reset.

Great game. Would have given it 5 stars but a recent update has made the commercials play at max volume. I play the game in silent mode, in bed, while wife is asleep. Sudden barrage of loud commercials has ruined the experience. It has actually resulted in me playing less and therefore has had me watch less commercials. Go figure.
For some reason all the videos have stopped working. The double coins video, the video for another life and the video to allow an extra spin of the wheel, please fix and I will 100% change my rating

Hard to win PvP when you can't get any power ups. Need to make it more fair. I have no trouble losing a game but when you make it to level 4 and only got 1 power up. Almost impossible to have a chance

Tried multiple times for them to give me my purchase, I have shown them the evidence and they agree I don't have my in game purchase and have been trying to fix it for ten days and won't issue a refund. Horrible customer service

Was fun at first but then got to the point that you realize planing multi player is a complete rip off.  No one gets the same amounts of bonuses so it's stacked.  Plus the constant losing because of "disconnected" issue is a pain.  Uninstalling
